Él es artesano trabaja el barro y sus componentes de lo que fabrica ladrillo de obra y de piso, es conocido por mucha gente como un hombre sano, trabajador y responsable, a la actividad se ha dedicado desde la edad de 10 años, su padre fue quien les enseño el oficio ya que eran ocho hermanos los que vivian en la casa, gracias al buen ejemplo de su padre, hoy tiene un oficio que realizar para toda su vida. No tiene más actividades a las que se dedique, ya que el trabajo que realiza le consume todo el tiempo, toda su vida se ha dedicado al mismo oficio. Donde realiza la actividad es aun costado de su casa, él paga personal para que le ayuden con el trabajo, su horario de trabajo es de las 6:00 am a 4:00 pm. 
  
El préstamo será invertido en la compra de materia prima, como leña, estiercol de caballo y barro, la mejora que tendrá con el préstamo es el poder hacer todo el ladrillo que sea posible y guárdalo para cuando le busquen tener, ya que por la actividad que realiza en el invierno es bien difícil trabajar, la necesidad satisfecha es el tener un capital propio de trabajo.

Sus sueños son seguir trabajando mientras pueda y que su familia tenga lo necesario para irla pasando, espera preparar académicamente a su hija que está en la casa, las ganancias del comercio del ladrillo serán invertidas en los gastos del hogar y el pago de la cuota.
texts.en:
Manuel, 55, studied up to the fourth grade. It was difficult to study back then, so he could not continue. The school he went to did not have a fifth grade and he would have had to go to a different town and he could not leave his responsibilities at home unattended. He got married when he was 24 and had three children with his partner, who works as a housewife. Two of their children are adults now, and their five-year-old daughter lives with them.

He is an artisan who works with clay. He makes bricks and floor tiles. A lot of people think he is a healthy, hardworking and responsible man. He has been working with this activity since he was ten years old, taught by his father. They were eight siblings in total and thanks to his father’s good example he has something to work with for the rest of his life. This is his only activity, as it takes all of his time. He has always worked with this. He works just outside his house and pays some people that help him. He works from 6:00 am until 4:00 pm.

He is requesting a loan to buy raw materials such as wood, horse dung and clay. With this loan he will try to produce as many bricks as possible in order to have enough in stock when he receives an order. It is difficult for him to work during the rainy season. It is very important for him to have enough working capital.

He dreams of being able to continue working in order to provide for his family. He would like to pay for his daughter’s education.  He will use his profits from the brick business to pay for the home expenses and to pay the installments of this loan.

loans.use: to buy wood, horse dung and clay to make bricks and floor tiles.

loans.name: Maria Amparo

texts.es: La Sra. Maria Amparo trabaja para el centro de salud publico desde hace 13 años como enfermera, este credito lo requiere para comprar material de construccion como zinc, perlines y mano de obra ya que salio afectada con los terremotos ocurridos en abril del 2014 con daño parcial en el techo y dormitorio, agradece a ceprodel por haberle brindado el apoyo por medio el credito otorgado.
texts.en: Maria Amparo has worked as a nurse for the Center for Pubic Health for 13 years. She needs this loan in order to buy construction materials such as zinc, beams, and labor since her roof and bedroom were damaged in the earthquakes that occurred in April 2014. Maria Amparo is grateful to Ceprodel for offering this support to her by means of this loan.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Lun

texts.en:
Lun, 55 years old, lives with her husband and seven children in a small village in Batheay District, in Kampong Cham Province. She has worked in agribusinesses for more than 20 years to ensure the needs of her children who are enrolled in school. Working in the farming business with her husband, Lun is able to make a net income of USD 4 per day to afford her family’s daily expenses. 

Currently, Lun is applying for a loan of USD 300, which is the first loan for her. She will use the loan to hire some laborers to harvest her cassava to sell to local dealers. Finally, she is grateful for the loan granted through HKL, which has a much lower interest rate than usual for this kind of loan product.

loans.use: to hire laborers to harvest cassava

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.en:
Alejandra has been earning from her transportation services and it helps with her living. She has successfully repaid her previous loan that she used for buying tires and spare parts. The service is now was safe and secure but she needs more accessories for a comfortable service. She took a new loan recently to purchase motor accessories like a helmet and raincoat.

In the future, Alejandra wants to have another motorcycle to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase motor accessories like a helmet and raincoat

loans.name: Norma Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia Norma pertenece al banco comunal VELASCO ASTETE, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Norma tiene 49 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de lechones y tamales, la socia realiza este plato para los distintos compromisos que solicitan sus servicios como matrimonios,bautizos entre otros, la socia a la vez es docente en uno de los colegios de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.

La socia solicito el crédito para  la compra de insumos como carne, manteca entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner Norma belongs to the communal bank Astete Velasco, located in the district and department of Cusco. 

Norma is 49 years old, unmarried, and has three children. She alternates her daily activities selling pork and tamales. She makes this dish for various events that request her services, such as weddings, christenings, etc. Norma is simultaneously a teacher at one of the schools in Cusco, and wishes to continue working in this way to support her family. 

She is applying for the loan to purchase supplies such as meat and lard among others. 

Norma is grateful for the loan granted and agrees to follow the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as meat and lard among others.

loans.name: Melvin Geovanny

texts.es: Melvin tiene 30 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hija de 4 años de edad. Melvin es albañil y de esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Melvin desea construir un afosa séptica en su vivienda y por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado avanzar y solo ha hecho el orificio. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra del material necesario como: arena, grava, cemento, grava y ladrillo.
texts.en:
Melvin is 30 years old and lives with his life partner and a four-year-old daughter in a house of their own. Melvin works as a mason. This is how he makes a living and sustains his family. He is a hardworking man who does everything he can to improve his family’s living conditions.

Melvin wants to build a septic tank at home but he has not been able to advance because he lacks the money; he has just dug the hole so far. This is why he is requesting a loan at FUSAI to buy the materials he needs: sand, cement, gravel and bricks.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish a septic tank: sand, gravel, cement and bricks.

loans.name: Mlongo

texts.en:
Mlongo is a very hardworking and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

She is asking for a loan to buy more clothing materials and thread for her business. She is grateful for the financial support she has received.

loans.use: to buy more clothing materials and thread for her business.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es un hombre trabajador con 55 años de edad vive en el Departamento de San Martin con su esposa.
Es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable, su principal meta es sacar adelante a su familia, por eso trabaja incansablemente para brindarles un futuro mejor.
Desde hace 7 años se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando principalmente el producto del Cacao ya que es un producto muy solicitado en el mercado y porque las tierras de esa zona son muy propicias para hacer de este cultivo un producto de excelente calidad.
Vicente está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar insumos como abono para las plantas y algunos plaguicidas, así como también realizará un mantenimiento del cultivo hasta la etapa de la cosecha. Con esto su producción será mucho mejor y en mayor cantidad, de esta manera podrá cumplir una de sus más grandes metas: “Ser el mejor productor de cacao de la zona”
texts.en:
Vicente is a hardworking man of 55 years of age. He lives in the department of San Martin along with his wife. Vicente is a responsible man whose principal goal is to help his family move forward. For this reason, he works tirelessly to offer them a better future. For seven years he has made a living as a farmer, primarily cultivating cocoa plants which is the product most solicited in the market. The land in this region is very good for producing high-quality cocoa plants. 

Vicente is grateful to Kiva lenders because with this support offered to him, he will be able to buy supplies such as fertilizer for his plants, along with some insecticide. This will help him maintain his crops until it is time to harvest them. With these supplies, Vicente's production will be larger and better in quality, which will allow him to achieve his biggest goals: "to be the best cocoa producer in the region."

loans.use: to buy plant fertilizer, insecticides, and to pay for labor to maintain his crops until the harvest.

loans.name: Luvuno

texts.en:
This is Luvuno. She previously accessed a loan that she used to stock her retail shop business. Her earnings were a big help for her personal, household, and business expenditures.

She is requesting a loan to purchase wheat flour and maize flour, biscuits, rice, and beans for resale. She appreciates Kiva for its financial support. 

She looks forward to this financial increase with happiness and thankfulness in her heart

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour and flour ,biscuits, rice, and beans to resell.

loans.name: Arbri

texts.en:
Arbri is a 26-year-old married father of a one-year-old child who wants to invest in a little boat and nets for his fishing activity. In addition to this activity, he plants and sells beans and has 30 cherry orchards. 

Arbri lives in a village near Lake Ohrid, which straddles the mountainous border between southwestern Macedonia and eastern Albania. It is one of Europe's deepest and oldest lakes, preserving a unique aquatic ecosystem that is of worldwide importance, with more than 200 endemic species. The importance of the lake was further emphasized when it was declared a World Heritage site by UNESCO in 1979. The towns situated at the lakeside are Pogradec in Albania, along with Ohrid and Struga in Macedonia.

loans.use: to purchase nets and a little boat for fishing

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more clothes to resell to her customers in her area

loans.name: Dede

texts.en:
Dede and Bardhe, husband and wife, want to invest in chickens, and they need your financial help to achieve that. The poultry business is what their focus has been on for very long time. As they say, they don’t have any education or profession that they could practice on; thus, what they have been doing so far is their best activity to earn an income. 

They plant corn, beans, wheat and seasonal veggies and have a few goats, all these to secure their staple food. Prior to arriving at the new location, Dede and Bardhe lived in a farther northern village where their lives were very difficult. Now, they have built a little house at their present location and live under minimal conditions.

They are the parents of four children, ranging in age from 13 to 21, with one of them born with some sort of disability.

loans.use: to invest in chickens.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia Celia pertenece al banco comunal VELASCO ASTETE, la socia es profesora cesante de uno de los colegios de la ciudad del Cusco, la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, leche entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the communal bank "Velasco Astete". The member is a teacher who was laid off by one of the schools in the city of Cusco. The member simultaneously continues with her grocery store business. The member sells different types of products such as rice and milk, among others. The member wishes to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue to support her family.

The member is requesting a loan to buy milk, among other things. The member is thankful for the loan granted and promises to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy milk, among other things.

loans.name: Dagoberto

texts.es: Dagoberto tiene 35 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo de tres años de edad. Dagoberto trabaja como jornalero en una finca cercana a su localidad y su esposa es empleada doméstica. Dagoberto y su familia habitan en condiciones muy humildes  y actualmente el techo de la vivienda se encuentra deteriorado por lo que solicita reste crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera y clavos.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is 35 and lives with his wife and their three-year-old son in the family's ow home. He works as a day laborer on a nearby farm and his wife works as a housekeeper. 

Dagoberto and his family live in very humble conditions and the roof on their home is in poor condition. He is therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI [Salvadoran Foundation for Comprehensive Development] to invest in the purchase of galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails that he'll use to repair the roof.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheeting, wood, and nails to repair the roof on his home.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia Irma se dedica al trabajo como docente,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este trabajo y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener una tienda donde pueda vender ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Irma works as a teacher from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m. She has been working in this profession for several years and things have gone very well for her. Irma's dream is to own a store from which she can sell clothing. 

Irma is requesting this loan in order to buy a television for her house. She is happy to have this loan and pledges to make all of the repayments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy a television for her home.

loans.name: Jesus Evelyn

texts.es:
La socia Norma pertenece al banco comunal VELASCO ASTETE, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Jesús  Evelyn tiene 51 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de  productos de belleza como colonias, cremas, perfumes entre otros, la socia vende a pedido a sus amistades ,familiares, entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez es docente de profesión, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para  la compra de perfumes para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Jesus Evelyn belongs to the communal bank VELASCO ASTETE, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

She is 51 years old, married, and has three children. She manages both her daily activities and her beauty products business. She sells products such as cologne, creams and perfumes, among others. She sells her products by taking orders from her friends, family members and others. She has had this business for some time and it is going well for her, thanks to the hard work she puts into it every day. Jesus Evelyn is also a teacher. She hopes to continue working so that she can support her family.

Jesus Evelyn is requesting this loan to buy perfume for her business.

She is grateful for this loan, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy perfume for her beauty products business.

loans.name: An

texts.en:
Mrs. An works in agriculture, farming food.

An is 50 years old and is married with two children.
An lives with two dependents in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, An joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. An has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

An has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that An faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, An hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: El Benedict Jhon

texts.en:
El Benedict Jhon is at university studying for a Bachelor of Science in Marine Engineering. 
El Benedict Jhon  is very dedicated to his studies and wants to become successful in his career. His parents earn their living as teachers, and he helps them work at various tasks to help them out. 
He is requesting this loan to pay the school tuition fees. His goal is to have a better life and career in the future.

loans.use: to pay his first semester tuition fees

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is a married woman who sells woven nipa in their village while her husband is earning from his carpentry works. Jocelyn also buys some of this from her neighbour to sell in town. She says she is satisfied with her business income since she has many customers who visit her place to make purchases. 

Even so, Jocelyn is asking for a loan in order to enlarge her business venture since she expects an increase in demands this summer. She borrowed from GDMPC micro credit to buy more palm leaves and woven products to sell. She hopes to improve the business to ensure a better source of income for her family in the future.

loans.use: to buy more palm leaves and woven products to sell

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a married man. He has four children. He describes himself to be courageous. He operates a carpentry business where he makes furniture to sell. 

He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located in a competitive location, and his primary customers are of all types. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. He will use the KES 15,000 loan to buy more stocks of carpentry materials. His business goal is to have a reliable business within five years. He hopes that in the future, his family will benefit.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of carpentry materials.

loans.name: Ummy

texts.en:
Ummy is a 45-year-old woman and married to Abdullah, 52. They have five children: Patrick: 19, a worker; Egi: 18, in 3rd grade of Senior High school; Satria: 13, in 2nd grade of Junior High School; Rasyad: 11 and the youngest, Salwa: 7, both are Elementary school students. 

Ummy runs a selling cakes business, such as donuts, fried tofu, breads, banana fritter, as well as other variant of sweets and snacks. She started the business using the capital provided by her husband, and is now keen to expand and increase her income. 

In order to do so, Ummy plans to increase the stocks in her business, which she hopes will increase her income, enough to assist her in paying her children’s school fees and living expenses. 

Ummy is requesting a loan of IDR 3,000,000 from TLM. The loan will be used to purchase the cakes ingredients, such as wheat flour, sugar, butter, etc.

loans.use: to purchase the cakes ingredients, such as wheat flour, sugar, butter, etc.

loans.name: Zuura

texts.en:
Zuura is a divorced woman; she has four children, all of whom attend school. Zuura owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

Zuura has operated a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other  operators in her business.
 
With the KES 50,000 she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a married man. He has five children with ages ranging from 5 years to 11 years. He describes himself to be determined. He operates a food stall. 

He has been involved in this business for five years. He describes his biggest business challenge to be a lack of financial resources. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to purchase additional stock. His business goal is to own a restaurant within five years. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables, chicken, tomatoes, etc. at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 26 años de edad  vive junto a su esposo y sus hijos en casa de un familiar; Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, tiene 3 años con este trabajo y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener los mejores resultados, su  negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy estratégica y frecuentada por las personas de la comunidad, es muy conocida pues sus tortillas son las mas ricas y siempre están calientitas, tiene mucha clientela y la buscan por su excelente calidad, buenos precios y sobre todo el servicio mas rápido; la clienta es una mujer luchadora, entregada a su labor, en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar su inversión pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, gas propano, etc.  Ella tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de otras instituciones y se hace responsable del pago completo de la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una vida mejor.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old. She lives with her husband and their children in a family members house. 

She sells tortillas. She has been doing this type of work for the past 3 years. She has a lot of experience which allows her to get the best results. 

Her business is located in a strategic area which is frequented often by people from the community. She is very well known since her tortillas are the best ones and they are always warm. 

She has a large clientele who come to her for her excellent quality, good prices and above all the quick service. 

She is a fighter who is dedicated to her work. In the past few months demand has increased so she wants to take advantage to increase her investment. 

However she does not have enough capital which is why she is requesting this loan to INTEGRAL. It will allow her to buy corn at wholesale, propane gas etc. 

She has good references regarding payment from other institutions and she is committed to paying back the entire loan. At the same time she has the hope to provide her family with a better life.

loans.use: o buy corn at wholesale, propane gas etc.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto es un hombre trabajador, tiene 42 años de edad y vive en el Departamento de San Martin junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos.
su mayor motivación en esta vida son sus hijos, por quienes lucha constantemente para poder brindarles un futuro mejor y formarlos como personas de bien.
Desde hace más de 5 años se dedica a la siembra, comercialización del cultivo del Cacao que es un producto muy famosos en el mercado. También se dedica a la producción de productos como el café, plátano, maní, le va muy bien porque es un hombre muy trabajador y sobre todo porque ofrece productos variados en el mercado.
Gilberto está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar insumos como abono, fertilizantes para poder realizar un mantenimiento a la cosecha y que de esta manera sus productos serán de mejor calidad, con esto él mejorará su producción y sus ingresos serán mayores.
texts.en:
Gilberto is a hardworking man. He is 42 years old and lives in the department of San Martin with his wife and their two children. 

His greatest motivation in this life is his children. He constantly struggles to be able to provide them a better future and to make them into good people.

For more than 5 years, Gilberto has worked in the sowing and commercialization of the cacao crop, which is a very famous product in the market. He also produces products such as coffee, bananas, and peanuts. It is going well because Gilberto is a hardworking man, and above all, because he offers various products in the market.

Gilberto is thankful for the Kiva lenders because with the help they have provided, he will be able to buy supplies, such as manure and fertilizers to be able to maintain his harvest. This way, his products will be of higher quality. This will improve his production, and his income will be greater.

loans.use: to buy supplies, such as manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Merino

texts.es:
Merino es un hombre de 35 años de edad, vive en el Departamento de San Martín junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos. 
Es una persona muy trabajadora que busca sacar adelante a su familia con su trabajo. Desde hace varios años se dedica a la producción y cultivo de cacao, le va bien porque tiene muchos conocimientos sobre la siembra y produce cultivos de excelente calidad,además que la carretera por donde traslada su producto es muy buena y no tiene mayores gastos en transporte.
Merino está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con su apoyo él podrá realizar un mantenimiento completo a los cultivos hasta la etapa de la cosecha, de esta manera podrá ofrecer productos de buena calidad y a un precio competitivo.
texts.en:
Merino is 35 years old and lives in San Martín Department with his wife and their two children. He has for several years grown and produced cacao. 

Merino works tirelessly to improve his family's situation, and his extensive knowledge of cacao planting and production has led to excellent harvests of high-quality cacao. Merino is also fortunate that the roads in which he transports his crops are in very good condition and his transport costs are therefore reasonable. 

Merino is grateful for the support of Kiva lenders as their support will allow him to perform comprehensive maintenance of his cacao crops until the harvest. Merino will therefore be able to offer high-quality products at a competitive price.

loans.use: to maintain his cacao crop throughout the harvest.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle.

Lan is 56 years old.  She is married and has three children.
Lan lives in Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2010, Lan joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Lan has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Lan has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Lan faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build a toilet .

With her business profit, Lan hopes to remodel her house, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet .

loans.name: Soviana

texts.en: Soviana is a 49 year-old single woman. She is a civil servant. Since she became a civil servant, she assists her mother in paying her younger sister Jeciha's, tuition.  Recently, she moved in to a house that was granted to her from her institution, and she has to spend her money on the furniture, kitchen set, etc.  At the same time, she has to pay for her younger sister’s tuition. This situation has led her to request an individual loan in the amount of IDR 4.500.000,  from TLM. The loan assistance will enable her to pay for her young sister’s tuition.

loans.use: to pay her young sister’s education fees

loans.name: Thúy

texts.en:
Mrs. Thúy works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. Thúy is 35 years old. She is married and has three children.
Thúy lives with three dependents in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Thúy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thúy has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Thúy has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Thúy faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bathroom and water filter system .

With her business profit, Thúy hopes for her children to do well in school, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bath-room and water filter systerm

loans.name: Mwenda

texts.en: Mwenda appreciates her previous loan that improved her living standards. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She would like to apply for a loan to buy more food ingredients, such as onions, cooking oil, wheat flour for her business. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy more food ingredients such as onions, cooking oil, wheat flour for her business.

loans.name: Dân

texts.en:
Mrs. Dân works in agriculture farming, poultry and cattle. Dân is 55 years old.  She is married and has two children.
She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Dân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Dân has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Dân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Dân faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine.She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bath-room.

With her business profit, Dân hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bath-room .

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 26 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, y es así como se gana la vida honradamente, con su trabajo logra solventar cualquier gasto que se le presente en su hogar, el cliente  vive con su grupo familiar, el quiere seguir con sus siembras ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo pero no tiene suficiente capital para poder realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito y poder comprar los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y también mejorar el terreno donde hace su siembra que es el que muestra la fotografía y asi poder seguirle dando a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old. For the past few years he has worked in agriculture growing corn and beans.

This is how he earns an honest living. With this work he is able to pay for all his household expenses. 

The client lives with his family. 

He wants to keep growing crops as this is his only source of work. However, he does not have enough capital to do it which is why he is requesting a loan in order to buy necessary supplies such as: fertilizers, pest controls, herbicides as well as to improve the soil that he harvests, which is shown in the photograph. 

This way he can keep giving his family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pest controls, herbicides as well as to improve the soil that he harvests,

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 21 años de edad se dedica a la venta de pan de torta y quesadillas, vende de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados y colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su suegra, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pan y quesadillas por mayor para poder seguir con sus ventas y tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This client is 21 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and mother-in-law. The client works selling pound cake and quesadillas [a kind of cheesecake] in various markets and neighborhoods near her home. The income from these sales allows her to meet some of her household expenses. 

The client is applying for a loan for the purchase of more wholesale pound cake and quesadillas so that she can continue her sales and she and her family can enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more bread and sweet cheese pound cake wholesale.

loans.name: Lam

texts.en:
Mrs. Lam works in agriculture farming poultry and cattle. Lam is 29 years old. She is married and has three children.
Lam lives with three dependents in Nong Cong district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Lam joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Lam has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Lam has been involved in this business for seven years.
The main hardhip that Lam faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Lam hopes to remodel her house, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick…to build toilet and bath-room.

loans.name: Rahel

texts.en: Rahel is a 31 year-old woman, married to Albert, a 42 year old man. From their marriage, they are blessed with four children, namely; Samy, 10; Amelia, 8, Mia, 7, who are elementary school students; and the youngest one is Leonardo, two.  Rahel runs a business crafting Bible covers, agenda covers, and small boxes for any purpose.  Use of local weaving pattern materials is a special point of her products. Rahel usually sells her products from one house to another, but there are also some customers who come directly to her residence to order the product. She really enjoys running the business. Currently, she intends to add more varied patterns as demanded by the customers, but she does not have much capital to do so. Therefore, she is applying for a loan from TLM amounting to IDR 4.500.000. The loan will be spent on more materials of ethnic patterns. She believes that the loan will assist her to improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase more various ethnic pattern materials

loans.name: Beverly Johelin

texts.es:
En la mesa de madera, cubierta por un plástico impregnado de flores de colores, se encuentra una cantidad mínima de cosméticos, perfumes y cremas para el cuerpo, que tiene en venta Beverlt. Esta joven de 22 años, inició hace 4 años como comerciante de productos corporales, sin dejar en algún momento sus estudios universitarios. Cuenta con entusiasmo lo bendecida que se sintió con su primer préstamo, con el cual pudo comprar mercadería como accesorios, cosméticos, entre otros, para ofrecerlas mayor variedad a sus clientes. 
En la actualidad, Beverlt necesita de un préstamo para aumentar sus productos, pues siente que es hora de seguir creciendo. De manera que invertirá de nuevo en su mercadería,  para la compra de cremas corporales, perfumes, aretes y otros productos de buena calidad, productos que son muy demandados por sus clientes. Afortunadamente vive con el apoyo de su esposo y de su familia, quienes juntos con los préstamos de MiCrédito-KIVA, la han ayudado en convertirse en una gran microempresaria que día a día lucha para seguir prosperando.
texts.en:
On the wooden table, covered by a plastic impregnated with colorful flowers, is a small quantity of cosmetics, perfumes, and body creams that Beverly has for sale. This 22-year-old young woman started 4 years ago as a merchant of body products, without stopping her university studies at any moment. She speaks enthusiastically of how blessed she felt when she received her first loan, with which she was able to buy merchandise such as accessories and cosmetics, among others, to offer her customers a greater variety.

Currently, Beverly needs a loan to increase her products, for she feels that it is time to continue expanding. She will once again invest in her merchandise, buying body creams perfumes, earrings, and other products of good quality -- products that are highly demanded by her customers. 

Fortunately, she lives with the support of her husband and her family, who together with the loans from MiCredito/KIVA have helped her to become a great businesswoman who day by day fights to move forward.

loans.use: to buy body creams, perfumes, earrings, and other products.

loans.name: Victor Jesus

texts.es:
Víctor agradece el apoyo de los prestamistas kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su confianza y  gracias a ello podrá comprar materiales para poder realizar refacciones en la vivienda donde habita como refacción de paredes agrietadas, tarrajeo de paredes, colocación de pisos y otros, de esta manera mejorara  su calidad de vida.

Victor es un joven de 21 años de edad y vive en la ciudad de chincha. Víctor es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que cada día se esfuerza en su centro de labores, el trabaja como operario mecánico, y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar sus gastos de manutención, el cree que le va bien porque es responsable en su trabajo. Víctor seguirá luchando por su gran sueño:” Tener una casa propia y estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Víctor appreciates the support given by the Kiva lenders. 

This is the second time they give him their trust and thanks to them he can buy material to repair the house that he lives in such as fix cracked walls, finish walls, lay flooring etc. 

This way he can improve his quality of life. 

Victor is 21 years old and lives in the city of Chincha. He is a young man who wants to move ahead. 

This is why every day he works hard every day at his office. He works as a mechanic. With the fruits of his labor he pays his living expenses. 

He believes things are going well for him because he is responsible at his job. He will keep fighting for his dream to "have my own house and study at the university".

loans.use: to repair his house ( fix cracked walls, finish walls, lay flooring etc.)

loans.name: Hector Hugo

texts.es:
Hector esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá realizar mejoras en si vivienda, mejora de paredes, pisos, ventanas, pintado, entre otros, asimismo podrá solventar algunos gastos personales y de esta manera podrá mejorar el estado de la vivienda donde habita.

Hector es un hombre muy trabajador, el labora como operario de construcción en distintas edificaciones de su ciudad, este humilde empleo es su única fuente de ingresos y por ello se esfuerza cada día  para poder salir adelante, sobre todo porque desea hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un negocio”.
texts.en:
Hector is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their support, he will be able to make some improvements in his home, including work on the walls, floors, windows and paint, among others. He will also be able to pay some personal expenses. His goal is to improve the condition of his home.

Hector is very hardworking. He works in construction as a machine operator at various construction sites in his city. This humble work is his only source of income, which is why he works hard every day to get ahead. He would like to make his greatest dream a reality, which is to have his own business.

loans.use: to make improvements in his home, including work on the walls, floors, windows and paint, among others, and to pay some personal expenses.

loans.name: Febrina

texts.en: Febrina is a 50 year-old woman and married to Ferdy, 62 year old entrepreneur man. They are blessed with three children: Riko, 25; Ivon, 22, both of them are worker; and the youngest one is Stans, 12, just graduated elementary school. Febrina started the business of car and motorcycle washing  two years ago. In order to assist her in running the business, Febrina hired an employee.  Two months ago, she had established a café business next to her car/motorcycle washing business, with the customers as her target while they wait for their vehicle to be cleaned.  The café was established using the income from the business of car/motorcycle washing. Currently, she needs some capital to re-stock the items at her café.  Therefore she requests a loan in the amount of IDR 4.500.000 from TLM. The loan will be spent on café stock, such as instant noodles, coffee, tea, sugar, and snacks.

loans.use: to buy café stock, such as instant noodles, coffee, tea, sugar, and snacks

loans.name: Marvin Mardoqueo

texts.es: Marvin de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su madre; el se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, el quiere invertir en insumos agrícolas pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, abono, insecticida, fertilizantes, controles de plagas herramienta, etc. y poder hacer una mejora en el terreno que muestra la fotografía ya que es esa zona el suelo es muy pedregoso, Marvin tiene buenas referencias de pago y está seguro que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá tener junto con su madre la vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Marvin is a 33-year-old farmer and lives in his own home with his mother. He grows corn and beans and has many years of valuable experience that allow him to achieve excellent harvests. Marvin sells his crops in the surrounding towns and has many steady customers, who prefer his high-quality crops, very reasonable prices, and unmatched service. 

Marvin wants to invest in agricultural supplies, but needs capital to make these purchases, so he's applying for a loan from INTEGRAL. This loan will allow Marvin to purchase seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizers, pest controls, tools, and other supplies. Marvin will then make improvements to his land, which appears in this photograph and is very rocky. Marvin has good financial references and is sure that he'll be able to repay the loan on time. He is also confident that he and his mother will achieve the life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure, insecticide, fertilizers, pest controls, tools, and other supplies that will allow him to make improvements to his land.

loans.name: Karam Group

texts.en:
Dalal is the featured representative of the Karam group. She and the other group members have been best friends, which brought them together to acquire a loan from Kiva’s field partner, Al Majmoua.
Dalal is a 40-year-old married mother of two, whose husband is a car blacksmith. Together they work hard to pay for the high cost of their children’s school tuition. Dalal is a handcrafts designer with 12 years of experience in the profession. She has extraordinary talents and her designs are well known among the neighborhood. 
Dalal is an ambitious woman who believes in taking advantage of  every opportunity on her path to success. She acquired a loan to increase her business merchandise with necessary business needs, special released items to grow her business in a well managed way and diversify her designs in the future. Dalal is wearing the red top at the right, Sara is standing in the middle of the picture, and Rania is on the left.

loans.use: To increase her business merchandise with necessary materials.

loans.name: Marta Adilia

texts.es: Marta tiene 56 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo. Marta se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y es así como colabora con la economía del hogar y logran cubrir las principales necesidades. Marta desea mejorar las condiciones del techo y del piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, arena, cemento y grava.
texts.en:
Marta is 56 years old, and lives in her own home with her husband. Marta provides domestic services. This is how she contributes to the household expenses, and they manage to pay for necessities.

Marta wants to improve the conditions of the roof and floor of the house, which is why she requests this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of sheet metal, wood, sand, cement, and gravel.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, wood, sand, cement, and gravel to fix the roof and cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies and pay for labor to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 21 años de edad vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia , él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene algunos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, el terreno está en un lugar accesible, apto para el cultivo y con suelo fértil, todo lo que produce lo comercializa en los alrededores de la comunidad, ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles, el cliente es una persona  responsable y muy trabajadora, el  solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semillas, herbicida, abono, herramienta, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía, asegura poder saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: The borrower is 21 years old and lives with his family in their own home. He works growing corn and beans. He has worked in agriculture for several years now, which has allowed him to gain a lot of valuable experience and obtain the best harvests. The land he works is in an accessible location, is suited to his crops and has fertile soil. He sells all that he grows in the area around his community. He already has many customers, because people know that he sells the best-quality products at affordable prices. The borrower is responsible and very hardworking. He is requesting this loan from Apoyo Integral to buy seeds, herbicide, manure, tools, etc. to improve the land shown in the photograph. He promises to pay off the loan, and he is confident it will help him offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, herbicide, manure, tools, etc. to improve the land shown in the photograph.

loans.name: Rosa Evelia

texts.es: Rosa de 43 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable, honesta y humilde, con gran esfuerzo hace varios años empezó a trabajar en la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijol, hoy ha tenido buenos resultados ya que obtiene una buena cosecha que comercializa en los alrededores de la zona, posee mucha clientela pues sus productos son de muy buena calidad y lo vende a buen precio, Rosa vive con su grupo familiar en casa propia, ella esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra como lo son: abonos, fertilizantes, herbicidas, controles de plagas, etc. y asi poder seguir con sus siembras y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa, 43 years old, is a hard-working woman who is responsible, honest, and humble. With great effort, several years ago she began to work in agriculture, planting corn and beans. Today she has had good results: she has a good harvest that she sells in the nearby area. She has many clients because her products are good quality and she sells them at fair prices. Rosa lives with her family in her own home.

She requests a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy products she needs to plant, such as manure, fertilizer, herbicides, pest control, etc. With this she can continue planting and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, herbicides, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 25 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su padre y su hermano, el posee un taller de estructuras metálicas, elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este negocio y tiene mucha experiencia que le ayuda a mejorar cada día su labor, hasta ahora el negocio le ha dado muy buenos resultados ya se hizo de mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles pero sobre todo porque siempre realiza el trabajo al gusto del cliente; el es un hombre muy trabajador, honesto y sobre todo humilde, siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan superarse y llegar al éxito; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para compra de material por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar, hierro, metal, herramienta etc. el está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The client is 25 years old and lives in his family's home with his father and brother. The client has for several years run a metalworking shop, where he makes doors, balconies, plowshares, and other products. He has gained a great deal of experience, and has been able to improve his work steadily and achieve excellent results. Customers have sought him out for the quality of his work and his reasonable prices, but most of all because he gives them what they want. 

The client is a very industrious, trustworthy man, and above a humble person. He is always looking for new opportunities that will allow him to improve his situation and achieve success. He wants to expand his business but needs capital to purchase materials, and is therefore applying for a loan from INTEGRAL. This loan will allow the client to purchase iron, metal, tools, and other supplies, and he is certain that he'll be able to pay off the loan on time while also providing greater financial stability to his family.

loans.use: to purchase iron, metal, tools, and other supplies.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: Jose de 52 años de edad es un hombre muy trabajador, responsable y honrado, desde hace varios  años que se dedica a la agricultura siembra cada año maíz y frijol, y esos años le han dado la experiencia necesaria para cosechar un buen cultivo, muchos vecinos dan buenas referencias de su persona y de los productos que comercializa por esa razón posee mucha clientela, él vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus hijos, Jose  está solicitando un crédito a INTEGRAL para poder comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios como: semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. y al mismo tiempo mejorar el terreno donde realiza su siembra que es el que muestra en la fotografía y así tener una mejor calidad de vida sin limitación alguna junto con su familia.
texts.en:
Jose, who is 52 years old, is a very hardworking, responsible, and honest man. For the several years that he has made a living in agriculture, he has planted corn and beans every year. Those years have given him the experience necessary to harvest a good crop. Many neighbors give good references of his personality and the products that he sells. For this reason he has a large customer base. He lives in his own house with his wife and children.

Jose is requesting a loan from Integral in order to buy necessary agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. and at the same time improve the land where he plants, which is shown in the picture. This way he will have a better quality of life without limitations together with his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. and at the same time improve his land.

loans.name: Rina Elizabeth

texts.es: Rina tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 17 años y 8 años de edad quienes se encuentran estudiando. Rina es una mujer muy trabajadora quien desde hace 13 años recorre las zonas de su localidad  ya que es promotora de salud. Rina solicita este crédito a FUSAI para  comprar un rotoplas para poner el sistema de agua elevado dado que actualmente se le dificulta la recepción del vital líquido.
texts.en:
Rina is 40 years old and lives in her own home with her two children, who are 17 and 8 years old and attend school. Rina is a very hardworking woman who has traveled the surrounding area for 13 years as a health promoter.

Rina requests this loan from FUSAI in order to buy a Rotoplas tank and filter for an elevated water system, because currently it is difficult to obtain water.

loans.use: to buy a Rotoplas tank and filter for a drinking water system.

loans.name: Candido

texts.es: candido de 44 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, su hija y sus tres nietos, el se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz, adicional a eso también trabaja como albañil y realiza viajes a las diferentes colonias, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Don Candido esta solicitando un credito para al compra de los insumos necesarios como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi continuar con sus siembras para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Candido is 44 years old and lives in his own home with his wife, daughter and three grandchildren. He is a farmer, and his primary crop is corn. In addition to farming he also works as a bricklayer, traveling to various regions. With what he earns through all of this work he is able cover their household expenses.
Candido is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary supplies such as fertilizers, compost, pest control and herbicides. In this way he will continue sewing his crops in order to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, compost, pest control and herbicides.

loans.name: Tomasa Elizabet

texts.es: Tomasa de 33 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos,ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la venta de ropa, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tambien vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su casa, Tomasa esta solicitando un credito para la compra de opa por mayor y asi poder seguir con sus ventas que le generan buenas ganancias y darle a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Tomasa is thirty-three years old and is a single mother.  She lives in a house that she owns together with her two children.  For the past several years, she has made a living selling clothing. She runs this business from her home and also sells door to door in the different neighborhoods close to where she lives.  

Tomasa is requesting a loan to purchase clothing wholesale.  In doing this, she will be able to continue with her sales, which allow her to earn good profits and to thereby provide a better quality of life to her children.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Choem

texts.en:
Choem, 45 years old, is a mother of two school children and three married children. She lives in a small village of Batheay District, in the Kampong Cham Province. She has worked in agribusinesses for four years to ensure the needs of her children, who are enrolling in school. Working in the farming business with her husband, she is able to make just a decent income to cover her family’s daily expenditures. 

Currently, Choem is applying for her first loan with Kiva in the amount of USD 1,500 to rent farmland to grow cassava trees. 

Finally, she is grateful for the loan granted through HKL, which has a much lower interest rate than usual for this kind of loan product.

loans.use: to rent farmland for growing cassava trees.

loans.name: Norma Estela

texts.es: Norma de 43 años de edad es madre soltera vive con sus dos hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela por la calidad y los buenos precios, Norma esta solicitando un credito para la compra de de ropa por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y poderle dar a su hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Norma is 43 years old. She is a single mother, living with her daughter in their own home. She sells clothing for women, men and children. She runs the business out of her home and has many clients, thanks to the quality and good prices of her items. 
Norma is requesting a loan to purchase clothing at wholesale prices, in order to continue her sales and to be able to give her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing from a wholesaler.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for making chocotejas (pecans, blancmange, butter, milk, etc.)

loans.name: Bình

texts.en:
Bình works in agriculture, farming food. She is 44 years old and she is married, with three children. Bình lives in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Bình joined the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women to improve her business. Bình has successfully repaid four loans from the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Bình has been involved in this business for more than ten years. 

The main hardship that Bình faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Bình hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase jewelry to sell in his store.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.en:
Agustina is a 59-year-old widow. She has four children: Nainson, 37; Taroci, 35; Petrus, 29; Ruth, 23. Three of them are workers, and the youngest one is in college. 

Agustina’s daily basic needs depend on her husband’s pension. Sometimes she assists her neighbor as a cook if there is a party held.  

In the next several months, Ruth, her daughter, will be completing her college, and she needs some money to pay the registration fee. This situation has led Agustina to request an individual loan in the amount of IDR 4,000,000 from TLM. The loan assistance provided enables her daughter to complete her bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's college registration fees.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is a married woman. She has three children with ages ranging from 9 years to 20 years. She describes herself to be determined. 

She operates a farm where she keeps dairy cows, which produce milk to sell. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in an area ideal for the business. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy animal feed. 

Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will benefit from the loan. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a very hardworking entrepreneur from Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is 37 years old, single and manages a fish farming business. She also operates an RTW and direct selling business, and cooks food to be sold during the wee hours. Her income from the business is helping with everyday needs and expenditures.

Fish farming has gained popularity due to the increased global need for fish as healthy and nutritious food. Farmers in the Asian countries enjoy raising fish as livestock because it requires minimal land for a high profit. Fish farming may be a business that requires specialized knowledge and extensive time, but with hard work, aquaculture can be a profitable business. Tilapia is the second most important freshwater food in the Philippines. The most important species is the Nile Tilapia (Tilapia Nolitica). Tilapia grows very fast and reaches marketable weight of at least 200 grams in less than six months. A backyard fishpond for tilapia will increase family income because it is a good quality food suitable for processing into dried, smoked, or salted dried. Other than different fish varieties, Rosemarie also has crablets, prawns, milk fish and lobsters. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 20,000 monthly.

Rosemarie is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan assistance to purchase more fish and other items most likely needed in her farming business. She will use her loan to improve her sales and her additional revenue to improve the general living conditions of her family.

*Rosemarie appears here in a photo at her direct selling business since her fish farming business is situated too distant from her permanent home.

In the future, she dreams that her business will continue to flourish and hopes to help her family to improve their quality of living.

She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy fish, crablets, prawns and lobsters to stock her fish pond.

loans.name: Masika

texts.en:
Masika is a married woman with nine children, four of whom attend school and the rest are adults. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past two years, she has operated a retail shop  business, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With the loan, she wants to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking  oil. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase soap, wheat flour, bread, milk, soft drinks, rice, beans and cooking oil.

loans.name: Nisa

texts.en:
Nisa is a 37-year-old woman. She is living in Mahmudlu-2 village with her lovely family - her husband and their 17-year-old son. Her son is going to the eleventh class, and in the future he wants to be a programmer. The family members are refuges from Fuzuli city, and for over 21 years they are living like IDP-Internally Displaced Persons.

Nisa has been in the poultry business for long years. She raises chickens and sells their eggs and meat. Today, to expand her poultry farm and buy more chickens, she needs a loan in the amount of 2,200-Azerbaijan New Manat. Nisa is very grateful to the Kiva organization and to the lenders for their help.

loans.use: to pay for expanding her poultry farm and buy more chickens.

loans.name: Thúy

texts.en:
Thúy works in agriculture growing industrial crops. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 42 years old and married with 2 children. She lives with her 2 dependents in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Thúy's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a hygienic latrine.She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and a bathroom.

With her business profit, Thúy hopes to build a new house, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is a married man. He has 4 children with ages ranging from 18 years to 40 years. He describes himself to be ambitious. He operates a tailoring business where he makes dresses, uniforms, skirts, etc. He has been involved in this business for 20 years. His primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be lack of capital. He will use the Kes 10,000 loan to buy a stock of tailoring materials. His business goal is to expand within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy a stock of tailoring materials.

loans.name: Hảo

texts.en:
Hảo works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She has been involved in this business for seven years.

Hảo is 37 years old and married with two dependent children, and lives in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2009, Hảo joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hảo has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hảo faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Hảo hopes to remodel her house, for her business to do well, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Hợp

texts.en:
Hợp works in agriculture, farming food. She is 44 years old and she is married, with two children. Hợp lives in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hợp's first loan with the Fund for Thanh Hoa Fund Poor Women. Hợp has been involved in this business for more than ten years.

The main hardship that Hợp faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

With her business profit, Hợp hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, and brick to build a toilet and bathroom.

loans.name: Viện

texts.en:
This is Viện. She works in agriculture, growing food. Viện has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is 36 years old and married with 2 children. She lives in Nong Cong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

The main hardship that Viện faces in her life is not having a hygienic latrine. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet  and a water filter system. This is Viện's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.

With her business profit, Viện hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her children to find a good job, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet and a water filter system.

loans.name: Ushirikiano Kiburugwa Group

texts.en:
Bertha, who is in her thirties, is married and has one schooling kid. She has been supporting her family by managing a grocery business selling beer, sodas, juices, water and spirits for five years now. She sells drinks from 3pm to midnight daily and is able to make a good profit per month. 

This is her third loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. Bertha used the previous loans (both of which she paid back successfully) to improve her grocery with more of the demanded drinks. Also, she made some bricks and started building on a room. She believes her business will grow more with Kiva's support. Bertha uses her business profits to plow back into her business and to cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy a frig for the business and beverages for her grocery. She dreams of managing a big bar.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Ushirikiano Kiburugwa" which totals two members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a frig for the business and beverages for her grocery.

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en: Abdu is fifty and married with ten school-going children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He is a farmer of cocoa and has practiced it for ten years.This has helped him to care for his big family's welfare and meet daily expenses. He dreams of expanding his farm by buying a big piece of land that contains cocoa and yields more cocoa for supplying the big cocoa agents. He is challenged by unpredictable weather changes and he wants to borrow a loan to buy some cocoa for selling.

loans.use: To buy cocoa for selling.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay for labor to nurse her coffee plants.

loans.name: Nhar

texts.en:
Nhar, who is a 41-year-old and a lovely mother of four schoolchildren and one unmarried child, lives in a remote area of Batheay District, Kompong Cham Province. To make a living, she has been working as a farmer for more than twenty years. Nhar and her husband are able to earn USD 3 in one day.

Recently, Nhar has applied for a loan, which is the first time for her, to pay for building a hygienic latrine for the sake of her family members. Thanks to the water loan program, with a special rate offered by Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL), Nhar is encouraged to focus on ensuring healthy living conditions, to safeguard the health of her family and to protect the environment.

loans.use: to pay for building a hygienic latrine.

loans.name: Uchi

texts.en:
Uchi is the mother of one child who is still underage. She lives in her own house, which has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past year, Uchi has operated a retail shop, selling to her neighbors and passersby. She mentioned seasonality and theft as her major challenges. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future.

With this loan, Uchi wants to purchase wheat flour, cooking oil, salt and maize flour for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, cooking oil, salt and maize flour for resale

loans.name: Han's Group

texts.en:
Han is a resident of the Moung Russey district located in Battambang province. She is a 32-year-old married woman who has three children who are dependent on her. The primary income source for the family comes from cassava growing. She has occupied this agribusiness for about 12 years already. 

Han leads a group of four borrowers to apply for the total loan amount of 5,600,000 KHR, each of them own the same portion of 1,400,000 KHR. As she is short of money, Han plans to use her loan portion to buy fertilizer for her cash crop. She strongly hopes that the loan will allow her to get a better yield from the farm so that she will be able to earn a higher income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her cash crop.

loans.name: Santos Silverio

texts.es: santos de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la venta y elaboración de hamacas, vende de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados y colonias, tiene clientela establecida ya que es un producto de muy buena calidad y a precios muy cómodos, Santos esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de hilo de seda de colores por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos, age 43, lives in his own house along with his wife and four children. For 30 years he has worked making and selling hammocks. He goes as a street vendor to different markets and neighborhoods. He already has an established clientele, since his products are of great quality and he sells them for reasonable prices. 

Santos is requesting INTEGRAL a loan to buy silk thread of different colors in bulk. With this, he will be able to continue with his work, since it is his only source of income, and will provide his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy silk thread of colors in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Maribel

texts.es: Ana de 30 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el esposo reside en estados unidos pero le ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica a la venta y elaboración de hamacas, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con a ayuda de su esposo logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Ana esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de hilos de seda de colores por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad d vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 30 years old and lives in her own house with her three children. Her husband lives in the United States but helps her economically. She makes a living through selling and making hammocks. Ana sells her products in different markets that can be found near her house. With what she obtains from her sales and the help of her husband, she is succeeding in getting ahead with household expenses.

Ana is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy colored, silk thread in bulk in order to be able to continue with her work and, in this way, be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy colored, silk thread in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta de 26 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo quien trabaja como albañil  y sus dos hijos, ella posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sopas, granos básicos, café, azúcar, refrescos, golosinas, etc. todo por mayor para surtir aun mas la tienda y asi poderle dar a su familia una menor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The client is 26 years old and lives in a house that she owns together with her husband, who works as a bricklayer, and their two children.  She has a small store located in their home.  With her sales and help from her husband, they are able to cover the home expenses.  

The borrower is requesting a loan in order to buy soup, basic grains, coffee, sugar, refreshments, snacks, etc. wholesale in order to stock her store.  This will allow her to offer a higher quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy soup, basic grains, coffee, sugar, refreshments, snacks, etc. wholesale.

loans.name: Fernando Antonio

texts.es: Don fernando de 63 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra maíz, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarlos a los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, Don fernando esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas,herbicidas, etc. y asi continuar con sus cultivos y poderle dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Fernando is sixty-three years old and works in agriculture.  He has planted corn for the past several years.  When his crop is ready, he stores it in granaries, which are shown in the photo.  He is then able to sell his crops at a later date at the different markets near his house.  

Fernando is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers, manure, pest-control substances, herbicides, etc. so that he may continue with his crops.  This will allow him to ultimately give his family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pest-control substances, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en: Joel is a married man who has one child. He operates a retail business where he sells drinks. Joel has been involved in this business for eight years. His biggest business challenge is competition. He will use the KES15,000 loan to buy more drinks. His business goal is to expand within five years. He hopes that in the future he will be successful. This is his third loan with SMEP; he repaid his previous loans successfully.

loans.use: to buy more drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her business.

loans.name: Trea's Group

texts.en:
Trea is a resident of Dambae district, located in Kampong Cham province. She is 24 years old and the mother of two kids. She grows cassava as her main source of income. The business, which Trea has had for six years, earns about 16,700 KHR per day. 

This is Trea's second loan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid her past loan, and it has improved her lifestyle in a gradual pace. The total requested loan amount is 800,000 KHR, of which 200,000 KHR will be Trea’s portion. She plans to use the entire loan to pay the land plowing fee for her cassava plantation. She hopes that the loan unlocks a way for her to expand her plantation next year.

loans.use: To pay the land plowing fee for her cassava plantation.

loans.name: Nhor's Group

texts.en:
A resident of the Dambae district, located in Kampong Cham province, Nhor is a 30-year-old married woman. She has four children who are dependent on her. Two of the children go to school, and the other two are too young for school. To earn a living for a big family, Nhor has been planting cassava to sell for about 12 years. 

This is the second cycle for Nhor with Kiva’s partner VisionFund, and she has successfully repaid her past loan. As a group leader, she is applying for the total loan amount of 2,100,000 KHR for a group of two members. She plans to use her loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide and to pay the land plowing fee as well as labor costs for collecting the yield. Nhor optimistically believes that the price of cassava will increase so she will be able to uplift her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide and pay labor fees

loans.name: Dario

texts.es:
